enWisdom: Loyalty is honour, friendship is compassion
Loyalty is the trait of the honourable
Loyalty is the twin of truthfulness
Loyalty is the fortress of eminence

Wisdom: الْوَفَاءُ عُنْوَانُ وُفُورِ الدِّينِ وَقُوَّةِ الْأَمَانَةِ
enWisdom: Loyalty is the symbol of abundant religiosity and strong trustworthiness
Loyalty is the ornament of the intellect and the symbol of nobility
Loyalty is the twin of trustworthiness and the adornment of brotherhood

Wisdom: الْوَفَاءُ حِفْظُ الذِّمَامِ وَالْمُرُوءَةُ تَعَهُّدُ ذَوِي الْأَرْحَامِ
enWisdom: Loyalty means preserving the rights [of others] and magnanimity means caring for one’s close relatives
The most honourable characteristic is loyalty

Wisdom: إِنَّ الْوَفَاءَ تَوْأَمُ الصِّدْقِ وَمَا أَعْرِفُ جُنَّةً أُوقَى مِنْهُ
enWisdom: Verily loyalty is the twin of truthfulness and I do not know of a shield that is more protective than it
When you make an agreement, fulfil it
By their faithful loyalty, the virtuous ones are known
The distinction of creatures is [by their] loyalty

Wisdom: دَارُ الْوَفَاءِ لَا تَخْلُو مِنْ كَرِيمٍ وَلَا يَسْتَقِرَّ بِهَا لَئِيمٌ
enWisdom: The abode of loyalty is never without the [presence of the] honourable, and is never occupied by the wicked

Wisdom: فَازَ مَنْ تَجَلْبَبَ الْوَفَاءَ وَادَّرَعَ الْأَمَانَةَ
enWisdom: Successful is the one who clothes himself with loyalty and arms himself with trustworthiness

Wisdom: مَنْ كَانَ ذَا حِفَاظٍ وَوَفَاءٍ لَمْ يَعْدَمْ حُسْنَ‏ الْإِخَاءِ
enWisdom: One who preserves [that which is entrusted to him] and is loyal will not be deprived of the benefit of brotherhood
